sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Threads/screengrab
Meta, ụlọọrụ nwe Facebook na Instagram ewepụtara akara mgbasaozi ọzọ a kpọrọ Thread, taa bụ Tọzde.
Dịka onye nwe ụlọọrụ ahụ bụ Mark Zuckerberg si kwuo, ebumnobi ha bụ na Thread ga-eche Twitter aka mgba ma merie ya.
Zuckerberg kwuru sị. “Ọ ga-ewetu obere oge mana e chere m na ọ ga-abụ ọbaozi ebe mmadụ karịrị otu ijeri ga-enweike na-ezukọ ma na-akpa nkata.”

Naanị awa ole ma ole e ji mepee ya bụ ọbaozi , ihe karịrị mmadụ nde iri atọ gunyere onyeisiala Naijiria bụ Bola Tinubu, Otiegwe Phyno nakwa ndị ejije Nollywood a ma ama dịka Chizzy etinyela aha  ha na ya bu ọba ozi na-akpọtụ n'ụwa kemgbe ụbọchị Tọzde.
Na -agbanyeghị na 'Thread kwụrụ onwe ya, onye ọbụla chọrọ ibanye ya ga-enwe akara Instagram bụ ebe ọ ga-esi abanye ya.
Ịbanye na 'Playstọrị maka ndị nwere ekwentị Android maọbụ Appstore maka ndị nwere ịPhone, dọrọ 'app Thread dọbata n'ihu ekwentị gị.
Ị pịa ya maọbụụ na i nwere akara Instagram n'ekwentị gị, ọ ga-egosi ohere itinye aha jị ma dọọkwa ozi dị n'akara Instagram gị.
Threads ga-enye gị ohere ịkpochi ọbaozi gị ka ọ bụụ naanị ndị na-eso gị na-ahụ ozi gị maọbụ ohere ịgbara ọha n'anwụ ihe ọbụla i mere n'elu ọbaozi ahụ.
Threads nwere ohere mkpisi edemede 500, ebe Twitter nwere 280.
Nke pụtara na mmadụ nwere ike iji ya dee ogologo ahịrịokwu karịa ihe i nwere ike ide na Twitter.
Na Threads, i nwere ike itinye onyonyo, toro ogologo rue nkeji ise mana Twitter bụ iheonyonyo nkeji abụọ na ọkara
I nwere ike ikerịta ozi izipụrụ n'Instagram na Threads maọbụ nke Threads n'Instagram
